dict.acceptation: 信号，暗号；预兆，征象；动机；导火线；
向…发信号；用动作（手势）示意；以信号告知；
显著的，优越的；暗号的，作信号用的；

sent.orig: Signal. txt storage is the turn signal a signal stored data II.
sent.trans: txt存储的是信号一信号二交替存储的数据。

sent.orig: RSW voltage signal, electrode displacement signal and electrode pressure signal contain explicit expulsion characteristic information.
sent.trans: 点焊电压信号、电极位移信号和电极压力信号包含明显的喷溅特征信息。

sent.orig: The DDS signal generator which can adjust signal phase signal frequency and complex wave is designed.
sent.trans: 最终实现频率、相位、复合波形皆可调节的直接数字合成的信号发生器。

sent.orig: Software for signal producing, signal gathering, FFT signal correcting and displaying are compiled.
sent.trans: 在软件方面，编制了信号产生、信号采集、FFT频谱分析、校正和显示等模块。

sent.orig: A typical SS7 network has signal switch points, signal transfer points and signal control points.
sent.trans: 典型的七号信令网有信号交换点、信号传输点和信号控制点。
